name: Ch9BBaseConvo3
_source: speak;Neimi;Um...Vanessa?|Have you gotten used to serving under Prince Ephraim yet?
speak;Vanessa;I'm still adjusting.|His command style is quite different from Princess Eirika's.|It took me some time to understand his approach.
speak;Neimi;I've noticed that too.|Princess Eirika was always so gentle with her instructions.|Prince Ephraim feels...|well, more intense.
speak;Vanessa;Indeed.|Princess Eirika leads with compassion and diplomacy.|Prince Ephraim is a battlefield commander to his core.
speak;Neimi;He can be a bit intimidating.|Sometimes I find myself hesitating when he gives orders.|Do you think he's disappointed in us?
speak;Vanessa;Not at all, Neimi.|That's simply his nature.|Where Eirika would explain, Ephraim expects immediate understanding.
speak;Neimi;Princess Eirika always walked us through her plans step by step.|Prince Ephraim seems to assume we'll catch on quickly.

speak;Vanessa;They may be twins, but their training couldn't have been more different.|Eirika was groomed for diplomacy and negotiation.|Ephraim was molded for military leadership and decisive action.
speak;Neimi;I've noticed how different they are.|Princess Eirika would always ask if everyone was alright after a battle.|Prince Ephraim checks our weapons and readiness first.
speak;Vanessa;A keen observation.|One focuses on the people, the other on the mission.
speak;Colm;Sounds like an interesting conversation.|Mind if I add my two coins?
speak;Colm;I prefer the term 'gathering intelligence'.|But yes, I couldn't help overhearing your discussion about our royal commanders.
speak;Neimi;Colm!|You shouldn't be listening to private conversations!
speak;Colm;Private?|In a military camp?|Besides, I've got my own perspective on their leadership.
speak;Colm;Under Princess Eirika, I had to account for every single item I...acquired.|Prince Ephraim, he just asks if the information was useful.
speak;Vanessa;Each leader has their strengths.|Princess Eirika's meticulous planning prevented many potential issues.|Prince Ephraim's boldness has saved us in critical moments.
speak;Neimi;I think I'm starting to understand Prince Ephraim better.|He might seem harsh, but...|I realize now that his directness comes from a place of care.
speak;Vanessa;Yesterday, he personally checked every archer's equipment before our march.|He knows how crucial each soldier's role is.
speak;Neimi;Really?|I thought he was just being strict.|He even complimented my archery skills during inspection.
speak;Vanessa;That's Prince Ephraim.|Direct, but never without purpose.|His orders might be blunt, but they're always calculated.
speak;Neimi;Maybe we need both of their leadership styles.|Eirika's compassion and Ephraim's decisiveness.
speak;Neimi;I'm going to be less intimidated from now on.|His directness isn't coldness-it's just how he leads.
speak;Vanessa;That's the right attitude, Neimi.|And remember, if you ever feel uncertain about an order, I'm here to help you navigate.
speak;Neimi;Thank you, Vanessa.|This conversation has helped me see things differently.
speak;Vanessa;We're comrades, after all.|Now, shall we prepare our equipment?|I'm certain Prince Ephraim's inspection is imminent.
speak;Neimi;Yes!|My bow will be in perfect condition.|And who knows? Maybe I'll even speak up during the next strategy meeting.
